docker.name: ENV
docker.raw: ENV NEO4J_SHA256=%%NEO4J_SHA%%     NEO4J_TARBALL=%%NEO4J_TARBALL%%     NEO4J_EDITION=%%NEO4J_EDITION%%     NEO4J_HOME="/var/lib/neo4j"     TINI_VERSION="v0.18.0"     TINI_SHA256="12d20136605531b09a2c2dac02ccee85e1b874eb322ef6baf7561cd93f93c855"

docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN addgroup --system neo4j && adduser --system --no-create-home --home "${NEO4J_HOME}" --ingroup neo4j neo4j

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt update     && apt install -y curl wget gosu jq     && curl -L --fail --silent --show-error "https://github.com/krallin/tini/releases/download/${TINI_VERSION}/tini" > /sbin/tini     && echo "${TINI_SHA256}  /sbin/tini" | sha256sum -c --strict --quiet     && chmod +x /sbin/tini     && curl --fail --silent --show-error --location --remote-name ${NEO4J_URI}     && echo "${NEO4J_SHA256}  ${NEO4J_TARBALL}" | sha256sum -c --strict --quiet     && tar --extract --file ${NEO4J_TARBALL} --directory /var/lib     && mv /var/lib/neo4j-* "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && rm ${NEO4J_TARBALL}     && mv "${NEO4J_HOME}"/data /data     && mv "${NEO4J_HOME}"/logs /logs     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j /data     && chmod -R 777 /data     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j /logs     && chmod -R 777 /logs     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && chmod -R 777 "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && ln -s /data "${NEO4J_HOME}"/data     && ln -s /logs "${NEO4J_HOME}"/logs     && mv /tmp/neo4jlabs-plugins.json /neo4jlabs-plugins.json     && rm -rf /tmp/*     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && apt-get -y purge --auto-remove curl
docker.raw: RUN apt update     && apt install -y curl wget gosu jq     && curl -L --fail --silent --show-error "https://github.com/krallin/tini/releases/download/${TINI_VERSION}/tini" > /sbin/tini     && echo "${TINI_SHA256}  /sbin/tini" | sha256sum -c --strict --quiet     && chmod +x /sbin/tini     && curl --fail --silent --show-error --location --remote-name ${NEO4J_URI}     && echo "${NEO4J_SHA256}  ${NEO4J_TARBALL}" | sha256sum -c --strict --quiet     && tar --extract --file ${NEO4J_TARBALL} --directory /var/lib     && mv /var/lib/neo4j-* "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && rm ${NEO4J_TARBALL}     && mv "${NEO4J_HOME}"/data /data     && mv "${NEO4J_HOME}"/logs /logs     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j /data     && chmod -R 777 /data     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j /logs     && chmod -R 777 /logs     && chown -R neo4j:neo4j "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && chmod -R 777 "${NEO4J_HOME}"     && ln -s /data "${NEO4J_HOME}"/data     && ln -s /logs "${NEO4J_HOME}"/logs     && mv /tmp/neo4jlabs-plugins.json /neo4jlabs-plugins.json     && rm -rf /tmp/*     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && apt-get -y purge --auto-remove curl
